name: ECODOM - CONSORZIO ITALIANO PER IL RECUPERO E RICICLAGGIO ELETTROD
goal: Ecodom is the largest Italian Household Appliance Recovery and Recycling Consortium. Founded in 2004 and operational since 2008, it is a private, not-for-profit Consortium that collects WEEE (Waste Electrical and Electronic Equipment) from collection facilities and treats it at specialist sites. The aim is to maximise the recovery of secondary raw materials and minimise environmental risk, benefiting member producers and the community.With 29 member companies and an approximately 62% share of the large household appliance market, in 2017 Ecodom handled more than 100,000 tonnes of WEEE.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Transport
